actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the marking of wearing apparel assembled abroad from U.S. products exported for purposes of such assembly.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to deem any article of wearing apparel assembled abroad and imported under the relevant section of the Tariff Schedules of the United States to be an article of foreign origin. Requires such article to be marked with the English name of the country in which it was assembled.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the marking of wearing apparel assembled abroad from U.S. products exported for purposes of such assembly.
